snippet: The private equity firm Silver Lake has acquired a minority stake in the William Morris Endeavor Entertainment talent agency, the two announced on Wednesday, in a move to expand their presence in new media.
abstract: The private equity firm Silver Lake has acquired a minority stake in the William Morris Endeavor Entertainment talent agency, the two announced on Wednesday, in a move to expand their presence in new media.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Silver Lake Takes Stake in William Morris Endeavor
